metadata.name: Logon from a Risky IP Address
metadata.comment: Detects when a Microsoft Cloud App Security reported when a user signs into your sanctioned apps from a risky IP address.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('securitycompliancecenter') AND lower(metadata.event_code) = lower('log on from a risky ip address') AND lower(actor.authorizations.decision) = lower('success'))

output.summary: Detects when a Microsoft Cloud App Security reported when a user signs into your sanctioned apps from a risky IP address.
